info.title: Azure Network Fabric Management Service API
info.description: Self service experience for Azure Network Fabric API.

put.description: Create isolation domain resources for layer 3 connectivity between compute nodes and for communication with external services .This configuration is applied on the devices only after the creation of networks is completed and isolation domain is enabled.

parameters.name: l3IsolationDomainName
parameters.description: Name of the L3 Isolation Domain

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

disabledOnResources.description: List of resources the L3 Isolation Domain is disabled on. Can be either entire NetworkFabric or NetworkRack.

items.description: ARM resource Id of the resource

administrativeState.description: Administrative state of the IsolationDomain. Example: Enabled | Disabled.

optionBDisabledOnResources.description: List of resources the OptionB is disabled on. Can be either entire NetworkFabric or NetworkRack.

items.description: ARM resource Id of the resource

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the resource.

aggregateRouteConfiguration.description: List of Ipv4 and Ipv6 route configurations.

prefix.description: IPv4 Prefix of the aggregate Ipv4Route.
IPv6 Prefix of the aggregate IPv6 Route.

administrativeState.description: Enabled/Disabled connected subnet route policy. Ex: Enabled | Disabled.

L3IsolationDomainPatchProperties.description: L3IsolationDomainPatchProperties define the patch resource properties.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags.
The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.
Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

mtu.description: Maximum transmission unit. Default value is 1500.

nextHop.description: List of next hop IPv4 addresses.
List of next hop IPv6 addresses.

allowAS.description: Allows for routes to be received and processed even if the router detects its own ASN in the AS-Path. 0 is disable, Possible values are 1-10, default is 2.

networkToNetworkInterconnectId.description: Gets the networkToNetworkInterconnectId of the resource.

disabledOnResources.description: List of resources the externalNetwork is disabled on. Can be either entire NetworkFabric or NetworkRack.

items.description: ARM resource Id of the resource

administrativeState.description: AdministrativeState of the externalNetwork. Example: Enabled | Disabled.

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the resource.

disabledOnResources.description: List of resources the InternalNetwork is disabled on. Can be either entire NetworkFabric or NetworkRack.

items.description: ARM resource Id of the resource

administrativeState.description: Administrative state of the InternalNetwork. Example: Enabled | Disabled.

bgpDisabledOnResources.description: List of resources the BGP is disabled on. Can be either entire NetworkFabric or NetworkRack.

items.description: ARM resource Id of the resource

bfdDisabledOnResources.description: List of resources the BFD for BGP is disabled on. Can be either entire NetworkFabric or NetworkRack.

items.description: ARM resource Id of the resource

bfdForStaticRoutesDisabledOnResources.description: List of resources the BFD of StaticRoutes is disabled on. Can be either entire NetworkFabric or NetworkRack.

items.description: ARM resource Id of the resource

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the resource.

Layer3IpPrefixProperties.description: Layer 3 primary and secondary ip address prefixes.

primaryIpv4Prefix.description: IPv4 Address Prefix of CE-PE interconnect links. Default value is 172.23.1.0/31. The values can be specified at the time of creation or can be updated afterwards. Any update to the values post-provisioning may disrupt traffic. The 1st and 3rd IPs are to be configured on CE1 and CE2 for Option B interfaces. The 2nd and 4th IPs are to be configured on PE1 and PE2 for Option B interfaces.

primaryIpv6Prefix.description: IPv6 Address Prefix of CE-PE interconnect links. Default value is 3FFE:FFFF:0:CD30::a1/126. The values can be specified at the time of creation or can be updated afterwards. Any update to the values post-provisioning may disrupt traffic. The 1st and 3rd IPs are to be configured on CE1 and CE2 for Option B interfaces. The 2nd and 4th IPs are to be configured on PE1 and PE2 for Option B interfaces.

secondaryIpv4Prefix.description: Secondary IPv4 Address Prefix of CE-PE interconnect links. Default value is 172.23.1.2/31. The values can be specified at the time of creation or can be updated afterwards. Any update to the values post-provisioning may disrupt traffic. The 1st and 3rd IPs are to be configured on CE1 and CE2 for Option B interfaces. The 2nd and 4th IPs are to be configured on PE1 and PE2 for Option B interfaces.

secondaryIpv6Prefix.description: Secondary IPv6 Address Prefix of CE-PE interconnect links. Default value is 3FFE:FFFF:0:CD30::a1/126. The values can be specified at the time of creation or can be updated afterwards. Any update to the values post-provisioning may disrupt traffic. The 1st and 3rd IPs are to be configured on CE1 and CE2 for Option B interfaces. The 2nd and 4th IPs are to be configured on PE1 and PE2 for Option B interfaces.

mtu.description: MTU to use for option A peering.

importRouteTargets.description: Route Targets to be applied for incoming routes into CE.

exportRouteTargets.description: Route Targets to be applied for outgoing routes from CE.

administrativeState.description: Administrative state of the BfdConfiguration. Example: Enabled | Disabled.

multiplier.description: Multiplier for the Bfd Configuration. Example: 3.
